resources.string: Using a combination of Big Data, AR, VR, AI, and if-statements, Fortune Teller predicts your future with 99.99% accuracy.
I want to be on the cutting edge of my future
Please answer a few questions to help our fortune teller better predict your future.
How many MDC meeting are you planning on attending this Fall?
Hmm...not the best fortune I\'ve ever seen... You can always add more meetings and peer into the crystal ball again!
Your future is bright! But there is still more that MDC can do for you...
Your future is beautiful and fulfilling. My work is done.

string-array.name: bad_fortunes
string-array.item: Willie the Wildcat is personally disappointed in you.
You forget how to do the Wabash.
You wear an itchy sweater every day for the rest of your life, to be worn with no undershirt at all times.
Every time you wear ear buds they are violently yanked out of your ears.

string-array.name: okay_fortunes
string-array.item: You become a junior sales associate at a midrange paper supply firm. That'll show em.

string-array.name: good_fortunes
string-array.item: You marry your soul mate that you met at MDC.
Bill Snyder asks you for your autograph.
You achieve the highest honor possible as successor to the MDC president.

string-array.name: meetingCountOptions
string-array.item: Hmm...I might try a few meetings...
You guys are basically my family already!
